text: 4-Thiouracil is a heterocyclic organic compound having a pyrimidine skeleton. It is a derivative of the nucleobase uracil with a sulfur instead of oxygen in position 4. It is found naturally in the 4-thiouridine nucleotide. == References == Category:Pyrimidines Category:Thioureas Category:Nucleobases
title: 4-Thiouracil
